text: Lucien Fenaux (1911-1969) was a French sculptor. He won the Prix de Rome in sculpture in 1943. He lived at the Villa Medici in 1946-1947. He designed sculptures in the church in Aunay-sur-Odon. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1969 deaths Category:People from Hazebrouck Category:French male sculptors Category:20th-century French sculptors Category:Prix de Rome winners
title: Lucien Fenaux
